about.description: This is Yuichi Ishiyama's profile. This is me.
about.name: Yuichi Ishiyama
about.kind: Web Design, Business Card Design, Front-End Development, Back-End Development, Mobile-app Development, etc.
about.introduction:
I was born on January 23, 1993 in Osaka, Japan. After working as a bartender for four years, I have been working as a software engineer since 2014.

I like soccer, and programming. Recently, I want to communicate with software engineers around the world ha-ha. And I want to improve my English and programming skill as a software engineer.

That's about it. Thank u.

project.title: Traffic data management screen. And server construction.
Research and development of power servers as developer and infrastructure engineer.
Tool for format of car navigation data.

about.note: Note: To keep confidential, concrete expression is omitted.

work.description: This is Yuichi Ishiyama's Works Page.
work.introduction:
These are stuff I made.
Please have a look at it.

overview.used:
This is Android Native App. The Name is UseD.
It is an application I made to recognize my own waste.
You can classify expenses into three types of spent, waste, investment, and you can see the proportion of expenditure.
And you can notice how much money we waste.
overview.ems:
This web application solves the problem that employee's face and name do not match.
And it make communication easier by profile page.
I was in charge of all planning, designing and implementation as New Project.

Note: Administrator screen is omitted.
overview.sms:
Managers usually manage sales on paper, so I developed salse management web application.
It can manage salses on PC, and make sales comparison easier.
overview.portfolio:
This is my portfolio site. The Name is FromScratch.
I want to keep to try that I create products of high quality. So I want to develop FromScratch. No template and no format.
overview.relation:
The relation, Inc. is a system development company.
I was in charge of all planning, designing and implementation as Renewal project.
overview.unaman:
The Unaman is specialty store of eel.
This is my first work in my life. I was in charge of all planning, designing and implementation as New Project.
